TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由所有者绘制控件 (如和控件) 引发。 `DrawItem`The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the and controls. 它包含用户绘制指定项所需的所有信息, 包括项索引、 和应在其上完成绘制的。 It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the , and the on which the drawing should be done. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者描述的项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性来指定所绘制的项是固定大小的 , 以及用于执行每个项到中的绘制的事件。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假设已将一个名为`listBox1`的控件添加到窗体, 该事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example assumes that a control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已使用文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum" 将项添加到中。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果项的状态为 , 则将设置为。If the item's state is , the is set to . 如果项的状态不是, 则将属性设置为。If the item's state is not , the property is set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名 `ListBox1`为的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type that is named `ListBox1`. 然后, 请确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者描述的项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性来指定所绘制的项是固定大小的 , 以及用于执行每个项到中的绘制的事件。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假设已将一个名为`listBox1`的控件添加到窗体, 该事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example assumes that a control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已使用文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum" 将项添加到中。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. summary.span: 在 构造函数指定的边界范围内用适当的颜色绘制背景。

span.span: Draws the background within the bounds specified in the constructor and with the appropriate color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在绘制的项为, 则会绘制背景, 并突出显示文本。If the item being drawn is , the background is drawn with the text highlighted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者描述的项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性来指定所绘制的项为固定大小 , 并指定执行每个项到中的绘制的事件。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假设已将名为`listBox1`的控件添加到窗体, 并且该事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example assumes that a control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已将项添加到中 , 并按顺序将项添加到了文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum"。The example also assumes that items were added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回要在中绘制的项的值。This property returns the value of the item being drawn in the . 如果从列表中移除项, 则此属性可以返回-1。This property can return -1 if items were removed from the list. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者描述的项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性来指定所绘制的项为固定大小 , 并指定执行每个项到中的绘制的事件。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假设已将名为`listBox1`的控件添加到窗体, 并且该事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example assumes that a control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已将项添加到中 , 并按顺序将项添加到了文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum"。The example also assumes that items were added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
